revised_title: Investigation of Thermal and Electrical Conductivities of Some Pure Metals
tldr: This article presents an investigation into the thermal and electrical conductivities of various pure metals. The author describes the experimental methods used, including the measurement of heat flow and temperature gradients, and discusses the accuracy and limitations of the results. The study provides valuable insights into the relationship between thermal and electrical conductivities in metals and contributes to the understanding of heat transfer properties.
